= TDWG 2009, working session on the DwC =

At the TDWG 2009, Dag Endresen and Samy Gaiji convened a working session on the DwC-G and the implementation of the DwC-G in the GBIF IPT. The working session also included a more technical presentation of the GBIF IPT by Markus DÃ¶ring, and a presentation of the GBIF Harvesting and Indexing Toolkit (HIT) by Kyle Braak.

Read more at [TDWG2009_DwC_Germplasm].
